item.title: Markdown Crash Course For Beginners
item.description: Before we start Hi! I’m back, today we are going to use Markdown, which is a powerful lightweight markup language for creating beautiful formatted text using only a text editor.
item.content:
Before we start

Hi! I’m back, today we are going to use Markdown, which is a powerful lightweight markup language for creating beautiful formatted text using only a text editor.
